name: Charlotte Linlin
text: On Play: If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, place up to 1 card from your deck at the top of your Life area. Then, trash up to 1 card from the top of your opponent's Life area.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, place up to 1 card from your deck at the top of your Life area. Then, trash up to 1 card from the top of your opponent's Life area.

meta.notes: Rarity is SR, visible in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the large 'SAMPLE' watermark.
